description: Move you camera until white dots will display in your screen. Touch at any white dots to start your learning!
Today we're going on a cellular adventure to identify the special compartments
within plant and animal cells, like tiny factories with specific jobs.
The Challenge: I'll display an organelles, some found in both cell types, and some specific to just plants or animals.
Your mission, is to name the organelle specific to animal or plant cell.
There will be venn diagram, the organelle will display if it's belong to the right side of the circle
if it's belong to the animal cell, in the right if it's belong to the plant cell and in the
middle if it's exist in both Refer to the venn diagram so you can identify those organelles easier!
Alright, detectives! Put on your thinking caps and let's identify these cellular components. Remember, teamwork is encouraged!
Good job! You got perfect score! You passed the assessment task!
